Posts.EditableText:
I was racing from room to room, when suddenly I got hit with an ERROR MESSAGE in extra large font of some fancy design, not only that., but it had smaller font of the same or a similar kind repeating the message underneath it, a larger message under that and three lines of smaller error message going into more detail further under that
The error seemed to be about an "attribute not  achieved". I don't remember the exact wording but it had the number 20 in it, and I think that may have been in reference to the font? I had not done anything, to my knowledge, to create strange font warnings, as I had been using the autoscripts, not doing freehand coding. I know it's not really called that.
Do I have a virus?

I was racing from room to room, when suddenly I got hit with an ERROR MESSAGE in extra large font of some fancy design, not only that., but it had smaller font of the same or a similar kind repeating the message underneath it, a larger message under that and three lines of smaller error message going into more detail further under that
The error seemed to be about an "attribute not achieved". I don't remember the exact wording but it had the number 20 in it, and I think that may have been in reference to the font? I had not done anything, to my knowledge, to create strange font warnings, as I had been using the autoscripts, not doing freehand coding. I know it's not really called that.
